Key Match Events: Tatum hit a 3-pointer in the first seconds
Boston tied an NBA record with 29 3's
Celtics opened a 35-point lead against the New York Knicks
Pre-Game Insights: Coach Joe Mazzulla emphasized the importance of the mindset of the guys: They weren’t stuck in the past
Post-Match Reflections: Jayson Tatum expressed pride in the team's effort after the win
Coach Joe Mazzulla was proud of the way the team responded from the ring ceremony to the game
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Celtics received their diamond-, emerald- and parquet-encrusted championship rings
The team raised the '2024 World Champions' banner to the crowded rafters
The pregame ceremony nodded to the history of the league's most-decorated franchise
Others: The exterior of the ring is encircled with the years of the franchise’s 18 NBA titles
The ring has 18 larger diamonds for the team’s 18 titles
The Celtics won their 18th title, the first since Bill Russell and John Havlicek won the franchise’s 11th title in 13 years in 1969
